SEARCH

Class Mark

java.lang.Object
User
Mark
All Implemented Interfaces:
CollegeInterface
public class Mark extends User
Represents an academic mark for a student. This class extends the User class and includes properties related to academic courses such as course code, course name, result, and GPA weighting. It provides methods to get and set details of a student's academic record.
Since:
1.0 (January 14, 2024)

  • Constructor Details

    • Mark

      public Mark(String courseCode, String courseName, int result, float gpaWeighting) throws InvalidIdException, InvalidNameException, InvalidPasswordException
      Constructor to create a Mark object with specified course code, course name, result, and GPA weighting.
      Parameters:
      courseCode - The course code associated with the mark.
      courseName - The name of the course associated with the mark.
      result - The numerical result/grade obtained in the course.
      gpaWeighting - The GPA weighting for the course.
      Throws:
      InvalidIdException
      InvalidNameException
      InvalidPasswordException
